transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Joshi sir se baat ho rahi hai? Meri shop pharma se.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Good afternoon sir, main Tauseef baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se relationship manager. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bahut badhiya ji, bataiye sir.
Executive: Sir right time hai baat karne ke liye?
Customer: Nahi abhi to sir on the road hu.
Executive: Available nahi hai kya abhi aap?
Customer: Nahi aaj office mein bhi nahi hu, bataiye phir bhi.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Achcha to sir aap bataiye kal kis time available rahenge? Mujhe connect karna tha thoda important aapke catalog se related. Kyunki last time.
Customer: Nahi last time kuch nahi hua boss uska. Last time aapke discussion hui thi but wo kuch hua nahi uska. Problem ho rahi hai.
Executive: Ussi ka feedback, ussi ka feedback lene ke liye call kiya tha, wahi sab cheeze dekhne ke liye.
Customer: Nahi to bataiye phir aap bataiye bataiye koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Abhi hai system wagera hai aapke paas?
Customer: Nahi nahi system nahi hai aap bataiye system se kya lena dena hai sir? System to main bhi pichle 11 saalon se use kar raha hu.
Customer: Har cheez malum hi hai kaha kya hai kidhar hai.
Executive: Nahi usme kya hai na ki jaise matlab pattern jo set karna tha, jo hamara discussion hua tha sir last time.
Customer: Kaise karenge aap kar do na phir waha se pattern aapke paas bhi user control hai aap set kar do pattern.
Executive: Nahi sir wo manually hamare paas access hi nahi hota hai na aapke account ka sir. To wo aapke side pe hi cheeze hoti hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi aap login login kar lijiye Meri Shop Pharma ko yahi number hai isi pe OTP aayega.
Executive: Allowed nahi hota hai sir kisi bhi supplier ka account login karna kyunki wo confidential information hoti hai sir buyers ki.
Customer: Confidential kuch nahi hai apne ko buyer ki detail waise bhi public domain pe hai usme koi fark nahi padta mere ko.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir wo aapne pay kiya hai sir wo jo inquiry aapke paas aa rahi hai wo aap.
Customer: Nahi nahi inquiry aa hi kaha rahi hai sir aap hi le lo wo inquiry jo aayi hui hai aap le lo usko.
Executive: Nahi sir hamara to business hi nahi hai sir aap.
Customer: Bhai agar inquiry aa rahi hoti to pichle 11 saal mein maine kabhi call nahi kiya concern nahi raise kiya. Abhi problem ho rahi hai to phir.
Executive: Exactly aap concern kar rahe hain.
Customer: Ab ye bataiye sir ki jaise jo by leads last time humne discuss kiya tha ki jisme by leads mein aap consume karenge us particular categories ki jisme aapko sabse zyada leads ki requirement hai. To uske baad se pattern.
Customer: Aa hi nahi rahi hai, aa hi nahi rahi hai search karke bhi kar rahe hain apna seller.indiamart pe bhi kar rahe hain trade.indiamart pe bhi jaake kar rahe hain but wo inquiry pattern set karne ke liye inquiry nahi mil rahi hai.
Executive: Wo particular category ki inquiry nahi mil rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi mil rahi hai. To phir kaha se purchase kare?
Executive: Nahi nahi asal mein main bhi yaha pe dekh raha tha sir. To aapki category mein competition itna zyada high ho gaya hai idhar ye do teen saal mein bhi sir bahut zyada suppliers add on hue hain IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Competition to sir aisa hai na competition to har jagah hai uske liye phir ab aisa hai na competition to phir uske liye aap dayra badhao 10 ki jagah 20 logo ko de do ek hi cheez ab usme jiski capacity hogi wo mature kar lega.
Executive: Nahi isme hum ek cheez kar sakte hain nahi by lead ki phir sir wo bhi ho jata hai na buyer bhi pareshan ho jata hai. Ab aapki category pe total October ke month mein 45608 by lead generate hui hai sir.
Customer: Wo do minute mein hi kar raha sir mere paas to ek bhi nahi aayi na generate hone ke baad bhi mere ko koi.
Executive: Wahi main aapko wahi bata raha hu reason kis wajah se nahi aayi generate hui hai.
Customer: Hmm. Ji ji.
Executive: Reason yahi hai sir sabse major ki jab aap jaise ki bata rahe hain ki aapke panel pe show hi nahi ho rahi hai aur balki past leads mein humne discuss kiya tha I think Komal mujhe bata rahi thi sir ki past leads ke section mein wo saari ki saari by leads show ho rahi hai matlab jo unki requirement aapko hai but wo kahi na kahi consume ho ja rahi hai.
Customer: Aapne to past ki hai but mere panel pe nahi pahunchi na. Ab yaar ye to ab baat wahi aa jaati hai ki aap login nahi hote aur aisa to nahi hai phir ki login nahi hote hain sara din hote hain raat din hote hain.
Executive: Nahi hota hai sir asal mein kya hota hai na ki.
Customer: Mili millisecond mein sir millisecond mein sir by leads consume ho jaati hai.
Executive: Nahi to phir nahi phir to yaar ab usme to phir aisa hai na millisecond mein kar rahi hai to phir ab millisecond ab raat din bhar phir to mere dimag mein chip set kar do ki bhai koi bhi cheez aaye aur turant mere ko information mile brain mein hi set kar do.
Executive: Haan wo karwa dete hain aapke browser mein na mujhe auto refresh wala ek extension side karana padega wo aapke jo team hai sir to wo kya hoga ki per second jo hai page refresh hoga. To jab page refresh hoga to automatically show ho jayegi kyunki yaha pe jo suppliers hai jo high sold category ki hoti hai jo sabse zyada to usme log yahi karte hain kuch extension download karte hain aur iske alawa bhi ek main aapko batau option kya hai dekhiye by leads to consume ho ja rahi hai but aap direct inquiry ke flow ko agar apne increase karaenge sir jo direct inquiry buyer aapko samne se kar raha hai to aap waha se ek achcha benefit.
Customer: Ek baat nahi ab thodi der ke liye ab pharmaceutical business hai ye monopoly base hota hai ek district mein ek hi distributor hota hai.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Ab inquiry jo product related inquiry hai wo kaun karega jo mere product ko janta ho.
Executive: Exactly.
Customer: Ab aapne maan ke chalo ki aapne Samsung S14 S14 ya S14 dal diya ab kaun dalega wo kaun search karega wo cheez ko jo janta hoga jisko S14 ya S14 chahiye hoga.
Executive: Exactly.
Customer: Theek hai na aapka lekin ab hamare ko to hamare ko to hamare paas to wo dene ka nahi hai na ab wo waha pe karega kisi ko mil nahi raha hai mera product ya kisi ko directly ab maan ke chalo aap mere stockist ho aur aap pura Noida district ko manage kar rahe ho theek hai ji.
Customer: Ab kisi dukan mein aapne distribute kiya wo distributor kya dukan dar kya chahega ki bhai Tauseef ki jagah mere ko ye product directly company se le lu main sasta mil jayega Tauseef ki jagah to apna 20% add karke le rahe hain aage.
Customer: To wo mere ko direct contact karega usko main dunga nahi.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Direct inquiry ka to main bol hi nahi raha hu kyunki usme na to aapka control hai na mera control hai wo aati rahegi wo useful bhi hogi aur unuseful bhi hogi.
Customer: Wo to by lead hi hai na jo mere preference pe main apne preference pe choose karunga by lead jo main directly jin ka mere paas number aayega wo mere ko by lead to mere ko proper milni chahiye isko isko proper aayegi aur for example aap waha rehne wale hain Noida mein.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Aap mein Max mein aapko mera product mila theek hai ji ab aap aap rehne wale Jodhpur ke ho Max mein Max Noida mein aap treatment karwa ke Jodhpur chale gaye ab dawai aapko Jodhpur mein chahiye wo aap IndiaMART online kahi pe bhi jao ghar mere ko phone karoge ki Joshi ji mere ko ye dawai chahiye.
Customer: Phir main puchunga aapko wo retail ya wholesale ke liye phir bolenge nahi ji mere ko to khud ke liye chahiye phir main puchunga likhi kaha thi phir bolenge Noida ke Max mein likhi thi ji.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Phir baat wahi hogi ki bhai ji ye to Noida mein milegi Noida ka number main de sakta hu baki Jodhpur se kuch nahi lena dena iska Jodhpur mein stockist nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi ab dekhiye direct inquiry jo hum log bechte hain sir bilkul aapne sahi kaha by list se aap log ek achcha business kar rahe the.
Customer: Direct inquiry to sir wo control nahi hai direct inquiry to.
Executive: Nahi direct inquiry se aap mujhe bataiye past ka record kaisa raha hai aapka jaise agar aapke.
Customer: Nahi direct inquiry pe sir main nahi zero direct inquiry zero hai kyunki inquiry pe focus nahi hota inquiries jo hai wo is tarike ki hoti hai jaise maine batai ya to dukan dar.
Executive: Inquiries I understand but sir aap ye batao inquiries bhi hum jo aapko bechte hain na wo aapki category ki basis pe hi bechte hain jin category mein aap.
Customer: Category ki basis pe to bechte hain but inquiry mere paas mein wahi hoti hai categories nahi hai jo product hote hain category alag hui category hogi jaise gyni ho gaya orthopedic medicine ho gaya pharma franchise ho gaya ya pharmaceutical distributor ho gaya.
Customer: Q10 ho gaya lycopin tablet ho gaya lyconutra tablet ho gaya liquizex ho gaya calcinate ho gaya ya phir ye dusre ka dydrolex tablet ho gaya fast dose ho gaya ye hai product aapke liye to category hai lekin mere liye product hai wo mere liye brand hai.
Executive: Haan lekin sir dekhiye brand jo hai koi bhi buyer brand ka naam dal ke to nahi search karta hai ab jaise kisi ko agar aapka ye medi glow karke ek sunscreen hai theek hai to aap kisi bhi buyer ko.
Customer: Medi glow brand hai wo medi glow brand hai exactly wahi keh raha hu wahi keh raha hu ab kisi ko agar wo end user ko chahiye hota hai end user ko brand jisko chahiye mera medi glow iska matlab wo medi glow ko janta hai wo user hai uska otherwise jo janta hi nahi medi glow ko usko to sunscreen bata raha hu.
Executive: Wo kya karega sir google pe ya IndiaMART pe sunscreen gel type karega jaise hi wo sunscreen gel type karega sir hamare IndiaMART pe jitne bhi suppliers honge jinhone apne product ko sunscreen gel ki category mein map kar rakha hoga uske samne wo puri list khul jayegi sir ab usme wo dekhega ki aapka ek medi glow SPF 50 sunscreen hai usne saari product details dekhi product details dekhne ke baad se usko lagega buyer ko ki ha ye particular medi glow ka SPF 50 sunscreen mere liye best hai.
Customer: Nahi to buyer wo apne ghar ke liye mangana chahta hai na ek piece wo to main dunga nahi.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo to bilkul aapki sahi hai wo kuch percent hoga jo retail ka hoga lekin hum yaha pe ek cheez aur karenge sir aapki har ek product ke niche hum ek minimum order quantity mention karenge.
Customer: Minimum order quantity nahi sabse pehle jo maine bola tha last time aap agar koi bhi inquiry dalta hai inquiry ya by lead post karta hai waha pe theek hai jo in field of pharmaceutical hai usme aap ek column add kariye have user drug license number jo user hai jo inquiry dal raha hai uske paas drug license number hai agar hai to it means wo business hai usko aap float kariye nahi to usko reject kar do phir post karne ki zarurat hi nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul baat aapki sahi hai wo to maine aapka feedback sir aage forward kiya tha.
Customer: Dawai usko aap to denge nahi.
Customer: Ha wo retailer hoga wholesaler hoga ye bhi bheed kam ho jayegi ki bhai jo buyer hai wo genuine hai ya phir wo customer hai.
Executive: Exactly.
Customer: Agar drug license number uske paas hoga it means they are having business agar drug license nahi hai to phir wo us cheez ko aap post mat kariye na kyunki jinke paas drug license nahi hoga medisoft pharma unko kuch nahi dega.
Executive: Bilkul baat sahi hai wo to kahi se bhi nahi milega usko wo to aapki baat sahi hai.
Customer: Usi ko hi dawaiya di jayegi jiske paas drug license number nahi hoga usko dawaiya nahi di jayegi.
Executive: Ji wo baat aapki bilkul sahi hai sir lekin aapka aisa bhi to hota hoga ki direct inquiry.
Customer: Waha pe waha pe error show kar do na jab bhi form fill karega inquiry form fill karega banda agar DL wala column khali rahega to wo inquiry submit hi na ho.
Executive: Haan yaha pe maine aapko ye wala medical industry ke liye chat jayenge ha feedback to maine aage forward kiya tha last time jab hamara discussion hua tha to aapne.
Customer: Wo implement kar dijiye wo wo marketing team sir abhi dekhegi cheezon ko phir implement karegi wo definitely work out ho raha hai.
Customer: Aisa hai na sir dekho marketing team aapki marketing team kyun apna traffic ghatana chahegi hai na aapka to lekin kuch kuch categories ke liye na kuch categories ke liye to hum restrict kar sakte hain na cheezon ko.
Customer: Wahi wahi legal cheeze hai na kyunki phir government bhi allow nahi karti hai na but wo to wo to ho ja but wo to ho jayegi na sir baat wahi hai ki businessman ke liye to business first hai.
Customer: Ha wo to sir lekin matlab main jo forward kiya hua hai flow kam ho jayega to wahi marketing team se puchenge ki bhaiya aapko business badhane ke liye hai pichle itne dinon se business kam kyun hua hai baat wahi aa jayegi.
Executive: Nahi wo to dekhiye sir jo genuine cheez hogi us pe work to zarur hoga aisa to hai nahi ki sir aadmi lead hi ko dekhega.
Customer: Dekh lete hain ek baar main kal aapko connect kal connect karta hu.
Executive: Ek kaam kijiyega theek hai aap ek kaam kijiyega sir mujhe kuch discuss ye karna tha sir aapse kyunki dekho sabse bada reason bhi sir ye hai na ki aap jo hai matlab business kar rahe ho proper kar rahe ho sir lekin aap kafi time se sir sirf hamari jo TrustSeal ki services hai teen saal se aap wahi chala rahe ho sir.
Customer: Ab aisa hai na ab wahi baat wahi hai na ab hum upgrade hone ka soche but agar aisa feedback aayega aisa response aayega to phir to.
Executive: Wahi main keh raha hu aapko wahi main aapko keh raha hu ki by leads ke prospective se abhi aap soch rahe ho pura completely main aapko jo dikhana chah raha hu wo jo main business main aapko dikhana abhi matlab ek baar aap online.
Customer: Pehle to theek hai ab aisa hai na dekho jo mera tenure bacha hai upgradation ke liye abhi jitna tenure bacha hai us tenure mein agar mere paas wo achcha feedback aayega to main upgrade karne ki sochunga agar yahi haal raha to upgrade kya phir agli baar main renewal bhi nahi karwaunga.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo to sir aapka call hai sir aapka business hai aap behtar samajh sakte ho kyunki aapne itne time se sir use kiya hai to.
Customer: Tabhi use kar rahe ho aap log marketing karte hain to phone karte hain ki ji IndiaMART pe aaiye ye kariye wo kariye but I was the person jisne maine khud se phone kiya tha ki bhai mere ko IndiaMART pe apna wo kaam karna hai mere ko usme batao process tab jaake enroll kiya tha humne khud se call karke.
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul kiya hoga sir dekhiye sir platform pe opportunity aur aapne business bhi nikala hoga sir itna aapne isi platform se ek achcha ek achcha khasa aapne justify kiya sir.
Customer: Aisa hai na business nikalna ek alag cheez hai business ke sath sath promotion bhi chahiye hota hai to agar business maan ke chalo 19 20 bhi hua hoga to promotion mein to 20 21 hi hua hai us cheez ko main galat nahi bolunga agar man lo to business mein 19 20 hua hoga chalega but promotion mein main to 20 21 hi hua hai.
Executive: Aap Joshi sir main ek cheez dikhaunga aapko aap thoda sa matlab system pe jis time baithiye na jis time kal aap jis time bhi boliyega aap bataiyega us time main call kar lunga aapko us time main connect kar lunga usme matlab jo suppliers IndiaMART pe na aap khud dekhiyega wo kis tarike se work kar rahe hain aur aap matlab aapka jo account hai wo kis tarike se work kar raha hai aapko khud difference dikhega sir main aapko unka bhi ek ek data dikhaunga ki unke paas kitni inquiries ja rahi hai kitni leads consume kar rahe hain aur kis tarike se wo business kar rahe hain matlab kuch maine aap se baat karne se pehle kuch R&D kiya tha ki maine socha ki aap available honge to ek baar abhi discuss kar lenge lekin abhi.
Customer: Ji ji main aapko 11 baje ke aas paas mein hai na.
Executive: Haan 11 baje main connect kar leta hu aap dekhiyega aapko khud lagega ki sir cheeze jo hai kya aapke liye humesha open minded rahe hain koi bhi cheez hoti hai to usko ek baar dekh lenge koi nikal sakte hain connect ka phone bhi aaya tha but main bahar tha to maine unko bol diya bhai main bahar hu aaj.
Executive: Haan main unko bol deta hu ki aapko connect nahi karenge wo kal hi hum log discuss kar lenge jo bhi hoga.
Customer: Haan chalo karte hain kal kar lenge koi issue nahi 11 baje ke aas paas mein theek hai sir.
Executive: Okay okay sir okay theek hai. Thank you so much for your time sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads despite subscription.

- Wants to upgrade subscription but hesitant due to current issues.

- Wants to know why buyleads are not being generated.

- Wants to know why past leads are not reaching panel.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about high competition in category.

- Executive offered to show other suppliers data.

- Executive suggested auto refresh extension for browser.

- Executive suggested increasing direct inquiry flow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day at 11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, trustseal, upgrade
